title: Horror Movies - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 2/15/21
itunes:title: Horror Movies - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 2/15/21
description:
George Noory and filmmaker Chris Alexander explore the history of horror movies, what continues to make them one of Hollywood's most popular genres, and some his his personal favorite films.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
